long_description: SRAM X9 10-speed trigger shifters deliver fast, precise shifts with ease so you can focus your game on the trails ahead of you. Exact Actuation design takes the 1:1 actuation ratio of cable travel/derailleur movement and optimizes it for easy, dependable setup and 10-speed application. Zero Loss Travel supplies faster shifts and exacting precision; levers move on ball bearings for smooth, long-lasting action. Front shifter has equal movement and effort for each shift; rear shifter can change up to 3 gears in 1 up-shift. MachMaker compatibility lets you clean up your handlebar clutter with 1 tidy clamp. Compatible with SRAM Exact Actuation(R) rear derailleurs as well as SRAM double (2x) and triple (3x) front derailleurs. Includes stainless-steel cables and front and rear shifters; choose between either 2x or 3x 10-speed shifter sets.
short_description: SRAM X9 10-speed trigger shifters deliver fast, precise shifts with ease so you can focus your game on the trails ahead of you.
